transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Hello. Hello, ha ji mam mai, ha ji mai ji meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Han boliye na. 
Hello.
Ji ji mai namaste mai aap se baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Ji ji mai aapko ye keh rahi hu ki aapka jo mail id hai na ispe Pradeep wala Harsh product karke. Uss pe jo IndiaMART ki taraf se mail kar rahe hai na.
Han.
Han, jo hum aapko IndiaMART ki taraf se mail kar rahe hai, wo mail aapke pe bounce ho raha hai. To aapke jo mail mein inbox hai na, usko aap delete kar dijiye. Wo mail aapke paas hai ya fir sir ke paas hai?
Sir ke paas hai. Lekin wo mam, ha, kya, kya dala hai wo?
Kya, kya, kya keh rahi hai?
Wo harshproducts@gmail.com wo id nahi dalna tha.
Fir kaunsa dalna hai bataiye?
Tumhara BD396 hai na, wo ek hi kafi hai.
Han. Nahi nahi wo jo harshproducts@gmail.com ye aapka pehle se registered hai na IndiaMART pe ye wali mail id?
Nahi register nahi hai mam wo kaunsi srishti ka? Srishti mam ne dala hai wo.
Nahi wo Srishti mam ne dala hai.
Han. Suniye, suniye, suniye mam aapko mai, mujhe pata hai. Mai hi hu Srishti, sahi baat kar rahi hu. Harsh product wala jo mail id hai na aapka. Jo purana mail id tha. Thik hai? Aap kaunsa keh rahi hai dalne? Already usme yahi pada hua tha. Jab aapki mail id chal rahi hai IndiaMART pe, yahi padi hui thi. Thik hai?
Hmm.
To isme kya ho raha hai jo aapke paas inbox hai na. Usme messages bahut jyada ho gaye hai. Haan, aapko usko delete karna hai. Abhi aapke paas mein mail ho wo agar, to delete kar dijiye usme. Mai line pe hu mai aapko guide kar dungi. Aur yaha se ha. 
Lekin abhi bhi wo shayad drive se kuch delete karna padega. Jarur. Nahi nahi drive se nahi karna padega. Nahi nahi drive se nahi karna padega. Agar aapke paas login ho mam. To waha se aap inbox delete kar dijiye. Maine bahut sare mam inbox mein se delete kar diye hai mail. Lekin tabhi bhi abhi. 
Abhi bhi nahi aa raha hai. Aap maximum delete, abhi mere, ha. Mai wahi keh rahi hu aap maximum delete kariye. Thik hai? Mai hu line, ha aap maximum abhi delete kar dijiye. Mai ek baar mai yaha pe aapko send karke dekh rahi hu. Aapki email registered mail id pe mai hello karke bhejungi. Mai meeting link bhejungi. Agar wo aapko receive ho raha hai, means aapka inbox abhi khali ho gaya hai. Otherwise yaha se bounce hote chala jayega. Isiliye mai aapko guide kar rahi hu ki aap usko waha se spam delete kar dijiye. Jaise aapke spam mein ho. 
Ji ji. Ha spam okay kariye. Mai bhi spam mein jo profile wo hoti hai na, id sorry. Aapka ye inbox spam ka hota hai na wo thoda sa high range mein hota hai. Mai samajh rahi hu. To uski wajah se ha full ho gaya wo storage.
Khali kiya mam aapne inbox aur spam?
Mai dekh rahi hu.
Han mai line pe hi hu. Aap dekh lijiye. Mai aapko ek baar cross wo kar rahi hu line pe hi karke. Fir ha confirm ho jayega jiske baad fir hum ticket close kar payenge.
Han. Mam dekhiye lagbhag maine 50 mail abhi delete kiye hai. Aap bhej ke dekhiye. Okay.
Thik hai. Ek second mai kaam kar rahi hu. Mai aapko yaha pe mail id, oh sorry registered mail id pe aapka meeting link bhej rahi hu. Dekhiye aapko receive hua abhi? Refresh kariyega.
Nahi mam abhi bhi nahi aa raha hai. Abhi bhi aapko mail aapko receive nahi hua?
Kya dikha raha hai abhi? Abhi out of storage ka message dikha raha hai. You can, you can't send or receive mail.
Okay to aap uske spam ko bhi ek baar khali kariye. Spam bhi kariye aur maximum messages delete kijiye.
Hmm.
Ho gaya abhi? Maximum delete karke ek baar aap mere ko screenshot share kar dijiye. Fir jo issue aa raha. Ya aap koi dusri mail id register karana chahte ho to wo bhi ho jayega isme. Harsh product ki. Wo BD396 hai na usse bhejiyega na aap. Nahi nahi to fir wo aapko apne se karna padega. Aap profile pe jaiyega. Pehle aap isko wo kariye. Fir delete kariye. Agar nahi hoga to dusri register karwate hai. Thik hai?
Are dusri gost. Tula khup dukht mhanje nahi kay hot ithe bhi. 
Ho gaya mam maximum delete ho gaya aapke?
Ji. Okay okay. Thik hai mai thodi der mein fir aapko mail bhej ke karti hu confirm. Thik hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's email inbox is full.

- Unable to receive emails from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to delete emails from inbox/spam.

- Executive sent a test meeting link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to delete more emails and check.

- If issue persists, register a different email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- email, inbox, spam, storage, delete
